scripts.docker:build:linux: npm run build:page && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t mybricks-apaas:v0.1.15 .
scripts.docker:build:mac: npm run build:page && docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64/v8 -t mybricks-apaas:v0.0.1 .
scripts.build:page: cd page && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && rm -rf ./dist && npm run build
scripts.zip:update: npm run build:page && npm run build:server && node ./obfuscator.js && node ./zip_update.js
scripts.zip:deploy: npm run build:page && npm run build:server && node ./obfuscator.js && node ./zip_deploy.js
scripts.zip:offline: npm run build:page && npm run build:server && node ./obfuscator.js && node ./zip_offline.js
scripts.publishToNpm: npm run zip:update && npm publish --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org && node sync.js --origin=https://my.mybricks.world
